heading: Today
text: Some sunshine developing in the south, otherwise mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, additional light accumulations possible. Highs through the 20s. West wind at 5 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 25 mph along Lake Champlain, higher gusts over the southern Greens.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy, periods of clearing in the south. Another chance of scattered snow showers, with the highest chances north of Route 4. Lows from the single digits to near 10, teens along Lake Champlain and in the southern valleys. West wind at 5 to 10 mph, gusting 20 to 25 mph, with higher gusts west of the Greens.

heading: Friday
text: Partly cloudy north, with more sunshine developing south. Slight chance of a morning snow shower. Highs from the low to mid 20s, increasing into the upper 20s and low 30s in the south. West wind 5 to 10 mph, gusting 15 to 20 mph, lightening up in the afternoon.
